message:
SYSTEM: 2022.11.PublicProcurementNLPChallenges.pdf: Página 27
Challenges in Public Procurement textual data
4.1. Pattern detection
27
Problem 1: Low amount of bidders
The more companies that apply for a tender, the higher the 
quality of the final Award. But:
•
Many tenders without bidders
•
Many tenders with just one bidder.
•
Low amount of SMEs being awarded.
4
The administration 
evaluates the bids
Possible Solutions
•
Clusterings taking into account the amount and type of clauses (e.g. social) to 
understand low bidding.
Related to next problem.
speaker: SYSTEM
